title: Sharpe-01-Sharpes Rifles-Reseed
description:
Portugal 1809, the Penisular War in the age of Napoleon. A British sergeant in the 95th Rifles saves the life of Arthur Wellesley, and finds himself promoted to Lieutenant and in charge of a company of Rifles that do no respect him, to carry out a dangerous and vital mission.



I\&#039;ll be re-seeding the whole series where needed as last year\&#039;s \"up\" is still going for certain episodes .

Please , if you can , seed as much as possible as it\&#039;s a damn fine series , don\&#039;t ya know .

The quality is variable as the various files came from different sources , but it is more than watchable and very enjoyable if you like historical drama .

Please see http://thepiratebay.se/user/wankan for the other episodes if you are new to \"Sharpe\" .

Enjoy .
